title: FOR SALE: Wonderful 7 Perch Colombo 6 House
details:
A rare opportunity to buy a smaller (7 perch) plot on 40-foot-wide Suvisuddharama Road, Colombo 6. Situated between Havelock Road and Duplication Road, the property is being sold for land value alone.

The 30-year-old 2250 sq.ft. house on the rectangular-shaped site comprises: 4 Bedrooms (2 Ensuite, including Annex), 4 Bathrooms, Sitting Room, Dining Room, Kitchen, Maid’s Bathroom, Small Garden, and Garage & Driveway.

Early viewing is highly recommended.

Website: www.britbrokers.com
